problem_text_cn: 如图,在⊙O中,∠AOB的度数为160°,C是⁀{AB}上一点,D,E是⁀{AB}上不同的两点(不与A,B两点重合),则∠D+∠E的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, the degree of ∠AOB is N_0, C is a point on ⁀AB, D and E are two different points on ⁀AB (not coincident with the two points A and B), then the degree of ∠D + ∠E is ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理．此题难度适中,解题的关键是准确作出辅助线,掌握数形结合思想与整体思想的应用．
